name: 張國楨
objective: This course introduces students to the main tools and methods of Engineering Geology and the problems that can create the geological conditions in the construction of civil works. Topics such as rocks and minerals, soils, geomorphology, river systems, flood control and earthquake activity are discussed with special reference to local geological problems. Colloquium based on selected textbook.
schedule:
1.	Mineralogy
2.	Rock and rock classification
3.	Plate tectonics
4.	Surface processes
5.	River system
6.	Brittle deformation – fault
7.	Brittle deformation – joint
8.	Ductile deformation – fold and folding
9.	Stress, strain and microtectonic analysis
10.	Field geology
11.	Active tectonics
12.	Tectonic geomorphology
13.	Natural hazards
materials:
1. 3d structural geology, Richard H. Groshong, Springer, 1999
2. structure geology, Haakon Fossen, Cambridge, 2010
consultation: 於教師諮時間、上課期間、亦或另外約時間討論
remarks: 如受疫情影響無法實體上課，則以 jitsi meet 方式上課 (AdvEngGeo_NTUT_23)
